general_perception.description and explanation:
In the traffic image, there is a large yellow construction vehicle loaded on the back of a flatbed truck, bearing the license plate HOT0225. It is occupying the right lane ahead of the ego car. The presence of this construction vehicle may potentially slow down traffic or cause unexpected stops due to its size and the nature of its transport. As a result, the ego car needs to maintain a safe following distance and be prepared to adjust its speed accordingly.

Additionally, there are metal barriers lining the left side of the road, which serve to separate the road from the pedestrian walkway. These barriers ensure that there is no possibility of pedestrians or other road users unexpectedly entering the road from the left. This allows the ego car to focus on potential hazards that may arise from the right side of the road.

driving_suggestion: Maintain a safe distance from the construction vehicle ahead, be prepared for potential slow-downs, and reduce speed as needed to safely navigate the curve. Stay alert for any unexpected movements from the construction vehicle and keep within lane markings.
